fields.description:
ship_mode table has 0 rows.

Query 
{code}
select count(*) 
from
          web_sales
         ,date_dim
 	  ,ship_mode
     where
 web_sales.ws_sold_date_sk = date_dim.d_date_sk
 	and web_sales.ws_ship_mode_sk = ship_mode.sm_ship_mode_sk
        and d_year = 2002
 	and sm_carrier in ('DIAMOND','AIRBORNE')
{code}

Explain

fields.summary: Estimate number of rows for table with 0 rows overflows resulting in an in-efficient plan

comments.body: Can't reproduce the issue. Please reopen it if the case is reproducible.
This has been fixed in 0.14 release. Please open new jira if you see any issues.
